title: Animals in modern life
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: Deals with the wide variety of uses to which animals are put in our modern civilisation - to furnish food, clothing materials, and power. Shows how animals have been domesticated and now, while power uses of animals are decreasing, more and more are being used for food and for clothing.
